body:
Looks like there was a test failure in the v2 api:

```
        with mock.patch('normandy.recipes.api.v2.serializers.JEXL', jexl_mock):
            assert not serializer.is_valid()
>           assert serializer.errors['extra_filter_expression'] == [
                'The JEXL parser failed to validate aces'
            ]
E           KeyError: 'extra_filter_expression'
```

Also a lint error:

```
normandy/recipes/api/v1/serializers.py:170:9: E303 too many blank lines (2)
```
